      • extract

        public void extract(java.io.Writer dataOutput,
           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: Processor
        Extracts raw Data set from the Database based on the CAM Template Database Mapping with provided filters as Map. The extracted data will be used for generation of OpenXDX XML through the Processor.generate(InputSource, Result) method. The main purpose of this method to create a data set that can be reused in multiple calls of the Processor.generate(InputSource, Result) method.
        Specified by:
        extract in interface Processor
        Parameters:
        dataOutput - The Writer for data extract
        parameters - CAM Parameters as Map
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generate

        public void generate(org.xml.sax.InputSource dataExtract,
            javax.xml.transform.Result xmlOutput)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: Processor
        Generates OpenXDX XML based on the CAM Template structure and Data set that has been extracted with Processor.extract(Writer, Map) method.
        Specified by:
        generate in interface Processor
        Parameters:
        dataExtract - Data Extract as InputSource
        xmlOutput - Generated OpenXDX XML as Result
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
